name: Easy Hide Admin Bar
author: Alex Dee

sections.description:
Who are we: Initially we designed this plugin for our website Dentists UAE . Dental clinics were allowed to add their clinics to the Invisalign Dubai page, however for dental clinics managers the admin bar was annoying since they wanted to see the website  the same as what any non admin will see.

This is why we designed this lightweight plugin and then we thought to share it with the community.
sections.installation:
1. Upload hide_admin_bar.php to the wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enjoy!, there are no settings for this.

short_description: Easily hide the Admin Bar for your Wordpress site
